directions: Fit processor with large-hole grating disk. Working with a few pieces at a time, push daikon, carrots, and broccoli stems through feed tube until all vegetables are grated. Transfer vegetables to medium bowl. Add green onions. Whisk vinegar, ginger, oil, and chili-garlic sauce in small bowl to blend; pour over vegetables and toss to coat. Season with salt and serve.
* Available at most supermarkets and at Asian markets.
ingredients: 8 ounces daikon (Japanese white radish),* peeled, cut into 1-inch pieces (about 1/2 large)
6 ounces broccoli stems, cut into 1-inch pieces
title: Daikon, Carrot, and Broccoli Slaw
